casebody.data:
Friday, September 4, 1998

MERIT DOCKET

98-1116. State ex rel. Podojil v. Bedford City School Dist. Bd. of Edn.

In Mandamus. On answer of respondent State Board of Education and on answer and motion for judgment on pleadings of respondent Bedford City School District Board of Education. Motion for judgment on pleadings sustained. Cause dismissed.

Moyer, C.J., Resnick, F.E. Sweeney, Pfeifer and Cook, JJ., concur. Douglas and Lundberg Stratton, JJ., dissent.
